title: Sphere connected to rod moving in a circle

content.question: A sphere of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is connected to a lightweight rod of length <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math> and moves at a constant speed greater than <math alttext="the square root of L g, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mi>L</mi><mi>g</mi></msqrt></math> in a vertical circle, as shown. The magnitudes of the forces the rod exerts on the sphere at positions <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>, <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>, and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math> are <math alttext="F sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math>, <math alttext="F sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></math>, and <math alttext="F sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></math>, respectively. Which of the following expressions is equal to <math alttext="2 m g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="F sub A, plus F sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></math>
<math alttext="F sub B, plus F sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></math>
<math alttext="F sub C, plus F sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math>
<math alttext="F sub B, minus F sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math>
<math alttext="F sub C, minus F sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="F sub C, minus F sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></math>
